description: Operational dashboard for Kubernetes administrators monitoring inboxfewer service health, performance, and resource utilization.

panels.title: Request Rate
panels.description: HTTP requests per second across all endpoints. Monitor for unusual spikes or drops that may indicate issues.

panels.title: Error Rate (%)
panels.description: Percentage of HTTP requests returning 5xx errors. Values above 5% warrant investigation.

panels.title: Active Sessions
panels.description: Number of currently active OAuth sessions. High values may indicate resource pressure.

panels.title: P95 Latency
panels.description: 95th percentile response time. 95% of requests complete faster than this value.

panels.title: Latency Percentiles
panels.description: Response time distribution showing P50, P90, P95, and P99 percentiles over time.

panels.title: Request Rate by Status
panels.description: HTTP request rate broken down by status code. Red indicates server errors (5xx), orange indicates client errors (4xx).

panels.title: Request Duration Heatmap
panels.description: Distribution of request durations. Darker colors indicate more requests at that latency.

panels.title: API Operations by Service
panels.description: Google API calls broken down by service (Gmail, Calendar, Drive, etc.).

panels.title: API Error Rate by Service
panels.description: Error rates for each Google service. High error rates may indicate API quota issues or configuration problems.

panels.title: API Latency by Service (P95)
panels.description: 95th percentile latency for Google API calls by service.

targets.expr: topk(10, histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (service, operation, le) (rate(google_api_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))))

panels.title: Slowest API Operations (P99)
panels.description: Top 10 slowest Google API operations. Useful for identifying performance bottlenecks.

panels.title: Tool Invocation Rate
panels.description: Rate of MCP tool calls from AI agents.

panels.title: Tool Error Rate (%)
panels.description: Percentage of MCP tool invocations that failed. Investigate if consistently above 1%.

panels.title: Tool Duration P95
panels.description: 95th percentile execution time for MCP tools.

panels.title: Top 10 Tools by Usage (1h)
panels.description: Most frequently used MCP tools in the last hour.

panels.title: Auth Success Rate
panels.description: OAuth authentication success rate. Values below 99% indicate authentication issues.

panels.title: Token Refresh Status (1h)
panels.description: Distribution of OAuth token refresh results. Failures may cause user re-authentication.

panels.title: Token Refresh Failures
panels.description: Rate of failed token refreshes over time. Spikes indicate OAuth infrastructure issues.

panels.title: Pod Status
panels.description: Current pod readiness state. Green indicates all replicas are ready.

panels.title: CPU Usage
panels.description: Container CPU consumption over time.

panels.title: Memory Usage
panels.description: Container memory working set over time.

panels.title: Pod Restarts
panels.description: Total container restart count. Increasing values indicate stability issues.

title: Inboxfewer - Administrator Dashboard
